channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP Commerce Backoffice
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP Commerce Backoffice

item.title: CVE-2024-45278|2024-10-08T03:21:25.904Z -- sap_se -- sap%20commerce%20backoffice
item.description: SAP Commerce Backoffice does not sufficiently encode user controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. After successful exploitation, an attacker can cause limited impact on confidentiality and integrity of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-41735|2024-08-13T03:49:48.215Z -- sap_se -- sap%20commerce%20backoffice
item.description: SAP Commerce Backoffice does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability causing low impact on confidentiality and integrity of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-41735|2024-08-13T14:44:24.355Z -- sap_se -- sap%20commerce%20backoffice
item.description: SAP Commerce Backoffice does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability causing low impact on confidentiality and integrity of the application.
